short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome browser extension created by the Office of Research Administration at the University of Maryland.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension currently has the following features to help save time when using Kuali Research 1) Pre-populates notice dates with the current date in new award documents and time and money documents 2) Hides all traces of the "Baltimore Only" direct F&A fields and 3) Allows you to enable/disable the extension as needed by clicking the extension "ORA" icon
